sn54.9:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn54.9:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhunam anekapariyayena asubhakatham katheti, asubhaya vannam bhasati, asubhabhavanaya vannam bhasati.
sn54.9:2.3: Namhi kenaci upasankamitabbo, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena”ti.
sn54.9:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva nassudha koci bhagavantam upasankamati, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena.
sn54.9:3.2: “bhagava anekapariyayena asubhakatham katheti, asubhaya vannam bhasati, asubhabhavanaya vannam bhasati”ti anekakaravokaram asubhabhavananuyogamanuyutta viharanti.
sn54.9:3.3: Te imina kayena attiyamana harayamana jigucchamana satthaharakam pariyesanti.
sn54.9:3.4: Dasapi bhikkhu ekahena sattham aharanti, visampi …pe… timsampi bhikkhu ekahena sattham aharanti.
sn54.9:4.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa addhamasassa accayena patisallana vutthito ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
sn54.9:4.2: “kim nu kho, ananda, tanubhuto viya bhikkhusangho”ti?
sn54.9:4.3: “Tatha hi pana, bhante, ‘bhagava bhikkhunam anekapariyayena asubhakatham katheti, asubhaya vannam bhasati, asubhabhavanaya vannam bhasati’ti anekakaravokaram asubhabhavananuyogamanuyutta viharanti.
sn54.9:4.4: Te imina kayena attiyamana harayamana jigucchamana satthaharakam pariyesanti.
sn54.9:4.5: Dasapi bhikkhu ekahena sattham aharanti, visampi bhikkhu … timsampi bhikkhu ekahena sattham aharanti.
sn54.9:4.6: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava annam pariyayam acikkhatu yathayam bhikkhusangho annaya santhaheyya”ti.
sn54.9:5.1: “Tenahananda, yavatika bhikkhu vesalim upanissaya viharanti te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatehi”ti.
sn54.9:5.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato patissutva yavatika bhikkhu vesalim upanissaya viharanti te sabbe upatthanasalayam sannipatetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn54.9:6.1: Atha kho bhagava yena upatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn54.9:6.3: “ayampi kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato santo ceva panito ca asecanako ca sukho ca viharo uppannuppanne ca papake akusale dhamme thanaso antaradhapeti vupasameti.
sn54.9:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gimhanam pacchime mase uhatam rajojallam, tamenam mahaakalamegho thanaso antaradhapeti vupasameti;
sn54.9:7.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato santo ceva panito ca asecanako ca sukho ca viharo uppannuppanne ca papake akusale dhamme thanaso antaradhapeti vupasameti.
sn54.9:7.3: Katham bhavito ca, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhi katham bahulikato santo ceva panito ca asecanako ca sukho ca viharo uppannuppanne ca papake akusale dhamme thanaso antaradhapeti vupasameti?
sn54.9:8.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.9:8.4: Evam bhavito kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatisamadhi evam bahulikato santo ceva panito ca asecanako ca sukho ca viharo uppannuppanne ca papake akusale dhamme thanaso antaradhapeti vupasameti”ti.
